name: Buzzy Business (amarokczukay)
description:
These eggs won't develop by themselves! Bite humans and harvest enough blood to develop your progeny.

Controls:

  • Move: Mouse
  • Bite: Space bar

Everything made by me except fonts (Retro Land Mayhem by Dayton Miller & Final by Eric Z) and raw sound effects (by allistersandwich, ScratchnSniff, katzblt, OwlStorm, aglinder, swordofkings128, DrMayta, iwanPlays & AndyTremble).
